ui:props.ui:text:
**GitHub SSO session expired.**

To fix this:
1. Go to [Settings  Authentication Providers](/settings/auth-providers)
2. Find **GitHub Cloud** and click **Sign Out**
3. Click **Sign In** to re-authenticate
4. Return here and try again.
